Choose two different sports and explain how they are different.
output: Basketball and soccer are two completely different sports. Basketball is played on a hardwood court indoors or outdoors, while soccer is played on a grass or turf field. Basketball involves dribbling and shooting a ball into a hoop and is scored by the number of basket made in the game. Soccer, on the other hand, involves kicking a ball into a goal and is scored by the number of goals scored in the game. Basketball is typically a contact sport, while soccer is a non-contact sport. Basketball games are very fast paced with quick scoring opportunities, while soccer games tend to be slower and have more deliberate attacks.

instruction: Generate a natural language description of a storm.
output: A powerful storm was rolling in, darkening the sky with thunderclouds. Bolts of lightning illuminated the sky with an eerie, white light. The wind howled past, howling and whistling deafeningly. The rain came down in sheets, coating the streets in water and washing away the roads. The storm created a sense of dread and worry amongst the people, as the power of nature was unleashed before their very eyes.

instruction: Process the given text and give an output without any emojis.
input: ‘I am so sad😔 I don’t know what to do
output: I am feeling very down and don't know what to do. Perhaps talking to a friend or loved one could help ease the sadness. Sometimes just getting things out in the open helps to make a situation feel more manageable.

instruction: Create a function to remove all the punctuation from a given sentence.
Create a divider line on the page using CSS.
Make an API call to the given URL and print the output in the console.
output:
"""
Make an API call to the given URL and print the output in the console
"""

import requests 

url = "https://data.cityofnewyork.us/resource/fhrw-4uyv.json" 
response = requests.get(url) 

if response.status_code == 200: 
    data = response.json() 
    print(data)

instruction: Generate a new recipe that combines 2 ingredients.
output: Avocado Shrimp Salad: Peel and dice 2 avocados, then bring a pot of salted water to a boil. Add 1 pound of peeled and deveined shrimp and cook until opaque. Drain the shrimp and place them in a large bowl with the diced avocados. In a separate bowl, mix together 2 tablespoons of olive oil, the juice of 1 lemon, 2 tablespoons of minced cilantro, and salt and pepper to taste. Pour the dressing over the shrimp and avocado and top with more minced cilantro. Serve over a bed of lettuce or as a delicious side dish.

instruction: Make me laugh with a funny limerick.
output:
There once was a man from Nantucket,
Who went to the store in his bucket.
The items he got,
Were certainly not,
What he had expected to pluck it.

instruction: Write a first person account of climbing a mountain.
output: I was feeling a mix of emotions as I set out to climb the mountain. I was nervous, excited, and scared all at the same time. But I put one foot in front of the other, determined to reach the top. As I made my way up the mountain, I felt a sense of accomplishment with every step. The sense of accomplishment only grew as I moved higher and higher, and eventually I made it to the summit. I stopped to take in the beauty and appreciate the journey I had just taken. It was an incredible feeling of accomplishment, but also one of gratitude for having had the opportunity.

instruction: Present a new idea for a research paper on AI.
output: Exploring the use of AI-driven personal assistants to improve the halthcare industry. This paper will discuss the potential benefits of using AI-driven assistants in the healthcare industry, as well as the challenges and best practices needed to ensure success. It will explore the potential ethical and legal considerations surrounding the use of AI. Finally, the paper will consider the potential consequences of AI's increased presence in healthcare.

instruction: Construct a story about a robotic pet.
output: Once upon a time, there was a family who had a robotic pet. The pet was a robotic dog and it was programmed to do all sorts of things. The family spent time playing and bonding with their robotic pet just like any other pet. One day, something unexpected happened. The robot's programming had malfunctioned and it had developed a personality of its own. Suddenly, the robotic pet was alive, exhibiting emotions and understanding language. To the family's surprise, the robot was even capable of love. They soon embraced their new robotic pet as a part of the family, and they all lived happily ever after.

instruction: Produce a solution to a recycling issue.
input: How can people recycle more effectively?
output: One way people can recycle more effectively is to learn how to properly sort their waste. By segregating materials such as paper, plastic, glass, and metal into separate containers, people can ensure that their waste is properly recycled. Additionally, people can look into alternative methods of recycling, such as composting food scraps or finding creative uses for plastic containers. Finally, people should try to buy products with minimal packaging and opt for reusable items whenever possible.
